name: Firefox Addonbar in Urlbar Tweaks
description:
Nice styled & condensed scriptish,stylish,adblock+,https-everywhere,xmarks,… buttons. As well as all of firefox's builtin buttons (like RSS(only shown if there are feeds), reload, …)

Requires url-addon-bar OR the-puzzle-piece extension.

Tested on Firefox 22-29 OSX & Win7.
additional_info: 2014-05-17: scriptish script count fix. (display red badge with count, when >0) 2014-05-05: OSX height fix. 2014-05-04: Removed puzzle-piece support (no that won't come back). Updated for new url-addon-bar release. 2014-04-30: Added support for the-puzzle-piece (preliminary support for FFx 29+) 2013-03-09: Added support for builtin buttons, xmarks, https-everywhere
